column3: â€œif you get the chance to try this strain, do it! It's a good medicine for relief during the day, also does wonders for my depression in the same way Lemonhead OG handles my depression.  Also I noticed my anxiety is completely nonexistent & that's very rare.â€

â€œPlatinum Huckleberry Cookies is a nice looking, tasty strain with colorful buds and loaded with trichomes! The high is a nicely balanced hybrid high that soars like a sativa but is nice and social at the onset then mellows to a comfortable indica narcotic effect later. Great for pain, anxiety, relaxation, lack of appetite, depression, and spasms.â€

â€œVery stoney. Able to hold intelligent conversation or thoughts if you want, but also can lose yourself in thought and just zone out. Physical actions are on autopilot. Like putting-your-phone-in-the-fridge stoned. Heavy eyelids. Of course being a cookies cross means I always get the damn munchies, but but not too bad with this.â€
â€œI have fibromyalgia and this strain has really helped with my pain!â€

â€œPlatinum Huckleberry Cookies is a favorite of mine for managing anxiety, especially social anxiety, migraines, and depression. In smaller doses it can aid in the creative process, help with some chronic pain, and make socializing even more enjoyable. In lager doses it can have you gleefully staring at blank wall (or help with insomnia). 
I've found this strain to be a definite creeper, with a stony high, and lots of ...â€
